com.wm.adapter.sap.idoc
Class IDataSegment

java.lang.Object
  com.wm.adapter.sap.idoc.IDataRecord
      com.wm.adapter.sap.idoc.IDataSegment
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocRecord, com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocSegment, com.wm.util.coder.IDataCodable, java.io.Serializable
public class IDataSegment
extends IDataRecord
implements com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocSegment, com.wm.util.coder.IDataCodable

Class that represents a single IDoc segment using IData to implement the IDocSegment interface.

The segment holds one data record of the associated IDoc and offers a structured field access to all data elements.

See Also:
Serialized Form
